concept.title: Using an HDFS User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the Hadoop FS origin to use an HDFS user to read data from HDFS.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS originusing an HDFS user to write to HadoopBy default, uses the user account who started it to connect to external systems. When using Kerberos, uses the Kerberos principal. Make sure updates to this topic go into the destination version of the file.

To use an HDFS user to connect to HDFS, perform the following tasks:
On HDFS, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HDFS user.
For more information, see the HDFS documentation.
In the Hadoop FS origin, enter the HDFS user name.
